Text saved: Because of what we found, we think Girox Foods should change how it manages people. Managers should focus more on the workers. We should find ways to give employees work hours that can change. We should also let employees work from places they choose, like their home. Managers need to give workers interesting tasks. They also need to say "good job" more often for their work. The company should spend more money on training for workers. This training can help them talk with other people better. This will help make a good place to work. Then, employees can do their best work.

Text saved: We learned some things. So, we think Girox Foods needs a new way to lead its workers. Leaders should think more about the workers. The company should give workers hours that can change. Workers should also be able to work from home or other places. Leaders need to give workers interesting things to do. They should also say "good job" more often. The company should pay for more training for workers. This training helps them talk to people from different countries and cultures. This will make the company a good place to work. Then, workers can do their best work.
